original_text: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.
korean_text: 내가 들짐승을 너희 중에 보내리니 그것들이 너희의 자녀를 움키고 너희 가축을 멸하며 너희의 수효를 줄이리니 너희의 길들이 황폐하리라

sentences.original_text: I will also send wild beasts among you
which shall rob you of your children
and make you few in number
and your high ways shall be desolate
